text: Ray Erskine Parker Jr. (born May 1, 1954) is an American musician, singer- songwriter, and record producer. He is known for writing and performing the theme song to the 1984 movie Ghostbusters. He is also known for his 1982 song "The Other Woman". ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American R&B; singers Category:American pop singers Category:American guitarists Category:American R&B; musicians Category:American pop musicians Category:American record producers Category:Musicians from Detroit Category:Singers from Detroit Category:Writers from Detroit Category:Businesspeople from Detroit
title: Ray Parker Jr.
